title: First run!
description: Ran 6 kilometers today. Not much, yet I ran :)

title: Next run
description: I was eager to go running the last days yet time just did not allow it. Need to find a way to balance my time

title: Yay, two days in a row!
description: Phew, this was a tough one! Muscles still tired from yesterday. Lesson learned: in the beginning it's better to have a day off in between to give my body time to recover.

title: I have a run
description: It's going well! A lot better today with the day off in between. I feel I'm getting better. Already eager to increase my mileage, yet I know I should not do this too early on.

title: Discipline
description: It was going so well! And then the last days I found way too many excuses... Really need to get more disciplined.

title: On the road again
description: New start. I reduced my mileage a bit in favor of first getting used to run more frequently each week.

title: Yes!!
description: Keeping going. Less mileage seems to have been a good choice so far.

title: The importance of equipment
description: Did not go running today, yet went to a running shop and got consulting on picking my next running shoes. I probably should have done this before starting the challenge, as I need to first get used to the new shoes. Slowly. No long distances for me yet.

title: Picked shoes
description: I've decided on my shoes now. They feel really good! Supporting my body, and also perfect for the ground I'm usual running on.

title: First run with new shoes
description: Oh my, these shoes are simply awesome!!! I feel I could run super long with them. Need to hold back yet, but super happy!

title: Progress
description: Even though I could not yet go running for a long distance, I already feel I'm making progress. Also, I did some additional workout and it seems it really supports my goal.

title: Keep going!
description: I finally could increase my weekly mileage! Just a bit, yet still I'm happy to move another step towards my goal.
